Class LevelView

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.levels.LevelView
Direct Known Subclasses:
LevelViewLevelTwo
public class LevelView extends Object
Represents the visual components and user interface for a game level. Manages the display of elements like health, kills remaining, pause text, win and game over screens, and a main menu button.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Constructs a new LevelView instance.
